description.en: Execute scripts from input to edit entries.
description.zh: 执行输入的脚本来编辑条目。

description.en: Edit the array named `entries` directly in JavaScript to have your project updated. Note that this plugin is more of a plugin for development, which requires you understand vLabeler's `Entry` and `LabelerConf` definitions.
description.zh: 直接在 JavaScript 中编辑名为 `entries` 的数组以更新您的工程。请注意，此插件主要用于开发用途，需要您了解 vLabeler 的 `Entry` 和 `LabelerConf` 定义。
